text:
Buried in the #COVID19 relief bill is yet another tax cut. It rewards approx 43,000 millionaires, & will cost $90 billion this year alone

The 2 trillion relief bill was held hostage by including this #GOPTaxScam.

#OneVoice1
#wtpTEAM https://t.co/Dyh4LElz5S
